definition: Solange is typically used to indicate a temporal condition or limitation, implying that something is valid or applicable only until a certain point in time or under specific circumstances. It is commonly employed to express a duration or extent of time during which a particular situation or condition holds true.

examples.german: Solange du hier bist, werde ich dich unterstützen.
examples.english: As long as you are here, I will support you.

examples.german: Solange das Wetter schön ist, gehen wir spazieren.
examples.english: As long as the weather is nice, we will go for a walk.

examples.german: Solange ich Zeit habe, werde ich dir helfen.
examples.english: As long as I have time, I will help you.

examples.german: Solange du dich bemühst, wirst du Erfolg haben.
examples.english: As long as you make an effort, you will succeed.

examples.german: Solange du ruhig bleibst, wird alles gut werden.
examples.english: As long as you stay calm, everything will be fine.
